text: <@UDKTZSD6H> That’s great! Please do (tag me). Not sure how much time you want to spend reading Alexander, but book 1 of Nature of Order is about harmonious configuration of centers, which is extremely geometric (Alexander is a trained mathematician). I am just about to finish book 1 and couldn’t help but think of your work several times. I’d really love to hear your take on it…
